definition: to paint/to smear/to apply (makeup etc)/to doodle/to erase/to obliterate
to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street
to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc

sentences.english: A is for Amen, anointing we agree.
sentences.chinese: 是阿們，我們一致的恩膏塗抹。

sentences.english: Spread abundant quantities of cream and massage carefully until absorbed.
sentences.chinese: 塗抹足量的霜，並且仔細按摩，直至完全吸收。

sentences.english: I am not a good painter but I like to daub.
sentences.chinese: 下一道手續是在牆面上塗抹一層沙漿。

sentences.english: Dry-treated - Ropes that have been coated with or immersed in a water-repellent chemical.
sentences.chinese: 外層塗抹或浸入一種防水化學物質的繩索。

sentences.english: It’s treated with nonprescription antifungal creams.
sentences.chinese: 可通過塗抹非處方的抗真菌乳膏進行治療。

sentences.english: Walls of imperial palaces and royal buildings were coated with white surfacer and decorated with red paint.
sentences.chinese: 宮城城牆以及高貴建築物牆體塗抹白灰朱粉爲裝飾。

sentences.english: She dispenses shampoo into her hands and massages it into my head.
sentences.chinese: 她將洗頭液在手裏按揉並塗抹到我的頭上。

sentences.english: Apply solution to the tube and allow to become tacky .
sentences.chinese: 在內胎上塗抹膠水並讓它發粘。

sentences.english: It can be easily used with freshing touch, non greasy, protect the skin with favorable moisturizing effect.
sentences.chinese: 雖爲乳霜，卻出人意料地易於塗抹，觸感清爽不油膩。

sentences.english: Ladies, try sleeping with coconut oil on your face at night.
sentences.chinese: 女孩子們可在臉上塗抹椰子油入睡。

sentences.english: Cream, oil, or powder can be applied periodically to reduce possible irritation.
sentences.chinese: 定期的塗抹乳液，按摩油或者粉餅能夠減輕刺激。

sentences.english: At other cases the OD 100 GA measure a too low temperature.
sentences.chinese: 在其他情況下，外徑100聯大措施過低坦佩叉塗抹。

sentences.english: Apply an antibiotic ointment to the tattooed skin while it's healing.
sentences.chinese: 紋身的恢復期需要堅持塗抹抗生素藥膏，預防感染。

sentences.english: The wind of the autumn colour the maples carmine .
Apple baby oil and powder to the baby.
sentences.chinese: 替嬰兒塗抹潤膚油及爽身粉。

sentences.english: Apply a small amount of cream or ointment and rub it in gently.

definition: to smudge (become smeared)/to smudge (create a blurred effect)/shading (wash painting technique)
as one wishes/according to one's wishes/at will/voluntary/conscious
